SELECT A.QUESTIONKEY,B.QUESTIONINSKEY,D.ANSWERKEY,B.PUBLISHKEY,B.TITLE AS publishTitle,A.QUESTIONTYPE,C.USERNAME,B.STARTTIME,B.ENDTIME,D.STATE FROM T12_QUESTION_INS A , T12_PUBLISH_QUESTIONNAIRE B LEFT JOIN T12_PUBLISH_USER C ON B.PUBLISHKEY=C.PUBLISHKEY LEFT JOIN T12_ANSWER_QUESTIONNAIRE D ON B.PUBLISHKEY = D.PUBLISHKEY AND C.USERNAME=D.USERNAME WHERE A.FLAG='1' AND B.FLAG='1' AND B.ARCHIVED='0' AND B.STATE='2' AND (B.PUBLISHMODE='1' OR B.PUBLISHMODE='3') AND C.USERTYPE='0' AND A.QUESTIONINSKEY=B.QUESTIONINSKEY
B.TITLE LIKE '%'||#publishTitle#||'%'
#starttime# >= B.STARTTIME AND B.ENDTIME >= #starttime#
C.USERNAME = #usernames[]#
D.STATE = #state#
A.QUESTIONTYPE = #questiontype#
ORDER BY $sort$ $sort_type$

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T12_QUESTION_INS A ,T12_PUBLISH_QUESTIONNAIRE B LEFT JOIN T12_PUBLISH_USER C ON B.PUBLISHKEY=C.PUBLISHKEY LEFT JOIN T12_ANSWER_QUESTIONNAIRE D ON B.PUBLISHKEY = D.PUBLISHKEY AND C.USERNAME=D.USERNAME WHERE A.FLAG='1' AND B.FLAG='1' AND B.ARCHIVED='0' AND B.STATE='2' AND (B.PUBLISHMODE='1' OR B.PUBLISHMODE='3') AND C.USERTYPE='0' AND A.QUESTIONINSKEY=B.QUESTIONINSKEY
B.TITLE LIKE '%'||#publishTitle#||'%'
#starttime# >= B.STARTTIME AND B.ENDTIME >= #starttime#
C.USERNAME = #usernames[]#
D.STATE = #state#
A.QUESTIONTYPE = #questiontype#

update T12_answer_questionnaire set answertime=#answertime#
state=#state#
endtime=#endtime#
where answerkey=#answerkey#

select * from T12_answer_questionnaire
publishkey = #publishkey#
username = #username#
answerkey = #answerkey#
select * from T12_answer_questionnaire where publishkey=#publishkey# and username=#username#

select u.username , case when J.totalscore is null then 0 else j.totalscore end as totalscore , case when a.state is null then '0' else a.state end as state, case when a.starttime is null then p.starttime else a.starttime end as starttime, case when a.endtime is null then p.endtime else a.endtime end as endtime, case when a.publishkey is null then p.publishkey else a.publishkey end as publishkey, case when a.questionkey is null then p.questionkey else a.questionkey end as questionkey from T12_PUBLISH_USER u left join T12_ANSWER_QUESTIONNAIRE a on u.USERNAME = a.USERNAME and u.publishkey=a.publishkey left join (select s.JUDGMENTKEY ,sum(s.score) as totalscore ,j.answerkey from T12_JUDGMENT_QUESTIONNAIRE j ,T12_JUDGMENT_SUBJECT s where j.JUDGMENTKEY = s.JUDGMENTKEY group by s.JUDGMENTKEY,j.answerkey) J on a.answerkey=j.answerkey left join T12_PUBLISH_QUESTIONNAIRE p on u.publishkey = p.publishkey where u.PUBLISHKEY=#value# and u.usertype='0'
